CustomField.description: Optional. The ID of the organization-wide email address associated with the outgoing email. The object's DisplayName field cannot be set if the setSenderDisplayName field is already set.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Optional. The ID of the organization-wide email address associated with the outgoing email. The object's DisplayName field cannot be set if the setSenderDisplayName field is already set.
CustomField.label: OrgWideEmailAddressId
